channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Former Google, Meta leaders launch Palona AI, bringing personalized, emotive customer agents to non-techie enterprises
item.description: Palona’s approach suggests that customer relationships don’t have to be sacrificed for automation—instead, AI can enhance personalization.

item.title: AbbVie’s newer immunology drugs are offsetting Humira’s decline, sending stock up 5%

item.title: Colgate-Palmolive is due for a turnaround, one analyst says. Here’s what can drive it.
